forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain...a thunderstorm or two as well. High 17C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain...a thunderstorm or two as well. High 64F. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early with some clearing overnight. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 50F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 62F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 20C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 68F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
